C14.Name: Calendula
C14.Fate: to USA as Ready 12 March 1942, to UK 20 August 1945, paid off 1945

C26.Name: Campbeltown
C26.Fate: expended as demolition-ship at St Nazaire, 29 March 1942

C32.Name: Candytuft
C32.Fate: to USA as Tenacity 4 March 1942, to UK 26 August 1945

C50.Name: Carinthia
C50.Fate: torpedoed 6 June 1940, foundered the next day

C55.Name: Carnation
C55.Fate: transferred to Netherlands 24 March 1943, paid off 4 October 1944

C64.Name: Cassin Young
C64.Fate: decommissioned 1960, museum ship at Boston, MA

C71.Name: Cavalier
C71.Fate: Paid off July 1972; museum ship at Chatham

C74.Name: Cayuga
C74.Fate: built and launched during the war, paid off 27 February 1964

C79.Name: Ceylon
C79.Fate: sold to Peru 1959, renamed Colonel Bolognesi

C103.Name: Charrette
C103.Fate: to Greece 1959, museum ship at Athens

C105.Name: Chaser
C105.Fate: paid off 12 May 1946, sold into merchant service, scrapped 1972/3

C110.Name: Chelsea
C110.Fate: to Canada November 1942, to USSR July 1944 as Derzkiy

C122.Name: Chicago (II)
C122.Fate: converted to missile cruiser 1964, decommissioned 1980, scrapped 1992

C133.Name: Churchill
C133.Fate: to USSR as Deyatelny 16 July 1944, sunk 16 January 1945

C170.Name: Colossus
C170.Fate: transferred to France, renamed Arromanches 6 August 1946

C188.Name: Conrad
C188.Fate: returned to Royal Navy 28 September 1946, scrapped March 1948

C202.Name: Coreopsis
C202.Fate: to Greece as Kriezis 10 November 1943, out of service 1952

C236.Name: Curie
C236.Fate: returned to Royal Navy July 1946, paid off May 1949
